story.iWant: I want a sortable domain table (GTM Radar) showing drift/downtime/attack scores with persona hooks
story.tasks: - [ ] Table rendering (AC: 1–4) - [ ] Query `domain_enrichment` and format into pandas/AgGrid table with color badges. - [ ] Add vendor icons (emoji or small PNG). - [ ] Provide persona buttons per row. - [ ] Filtering/persistence (AC: 2) - [ ] Add multi-select filters + search bar; store selections in session state. - [ ] Row selection integration (AC: 3) - [ ] Clicking persona button triggers `st.session_state["selected_domain"]` and jumps to persona section. - [ ] Refresh hooks (AC: 5) - [ ] Add “Refresh data” button or auto-refresh interval after job success. - [ ] Theme polish (AC: 4) - [ ] Apply consistent spacing, focus outlines, accessibility tags.

story-context.acceptanceCriteria: 1. Radar table lists domains with columns: Domain, Detected WAF/CDN (icons), Drift/Downtime/Attack scores (color-coded badges), Freshness warning, Persona quick links (buttons). 2. Table supports sorting by any score and filtering by vendor, persona relevance, or freshness status; filters persist via `st.session_state`. 3. Selecting a row (or clicking persona button) scrolls to / opens the persona cards (Story 3.4). 4. Layout matches UX spec (Midnight Intelligence theme, responsive two-column layout) and supports empty-state messaging. 5. Data auto-refreshes when enrichment job completes (poll job log or provide “Refresh” button).
